document.full_text: authorities across asia stepped up checks this week on japanese imports after radioactive contaminants showed up in food and water in quake-stricken japan following blasts at a nuclear plant last week.
document.title: experts pore over contaminants after japan accident
lines_and_colors: authorities across asia stepped up checks this week on japanese imports after radioactive contaminants showed up in food and water in quake-stricken japan following blasts at a nuclear plant last week.
